text:
Hello, I have an email design that I am trying to add into HubSpot. I spoke with HubSpot support and they directed me here, not sure if this is the correct channel for it but here goes:
The design was an .indd file that I converted to html, when accessed on a webpage everything loads as intended but when I upload it into HubSpot it comes out all over the place. Would anyone be able to assist me with this? I am not a dev and have a limited understanding of code but willing to learn and appreciate any help I can get

Hey all, does anyone  know how to access a key within a array using HubL? I tried

```for x in z
   arrayObj[x]```
and

```for x in z
   arrayObj[{{x}}]```
but no luck

Try setting obj to ds_json|pprint 

Idea being it reads the json object as a string <@U05RC9G9QSW>
